name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A foundational course on programming principles, algorithms, and computational thinking using Python.

name: Calculus I
description: An introduction to differential calculus, including limits, derivatives, and their applications.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Covers vector spaces, linear transformations, matrices, determinants, and eigenvalues.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: In-depth study of fundamental data structures and the algorithms that operate on them.

name: Introduction to Psychology
description: A survey of the major topics in psychology, including cognitive, social, and developmental psychology.

name: World History: 1500 to Present
description: Examines major global events, trends, and interactions from the early modern period to today.

name: Principles of Microeconomics
description: Analyzes the behavior of individual economic agents, including consumers and firms, and market outcomes.

name: General Chemistry I
description: Covers fundamental principles of chemistry, including atomic structure, bonding, and stoichiometry.

name: Introduction to Sociology
description: An exploration of social structures, social interaction, and the dynamics of human society.

name: Art History: Renaissance to Modern
description: A survey of major movements and artists in Western art from the 14th century to the 20th century.

name: Introduction to Philosophy
description: An introduction to the main branches of philosophy, including metaphysics, epistemology, and ethics.

name: English Composition 101
description: Focuses on developing skills in critical reading, writing, and analytical argument.
